snippet: Vladimir V. Putin has emerged as the fulcrum in efforts by Western nations and Arab foes to force President Bashar al-Assad of Syria to step down.
lead_paragraph: Vladimir V. Putin has emerged as the fulcrum in efforts by Western nations and Arab foes to force President Bashar al-Assad of Syria to step down.

headline.seo: Putin Sees Worsening Conflict in Syria but Rejects Outside Intervention
